label: 明経
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: One of the four civil service examinations.  Others were shūsai (flourishing talent"), shinshi ("presented scholar"--the Chinese chin-shih), and myōbō (law).  On the classics examinations, candidates were asked meanings of ten passages from specified Confucian classics (p. 75). [秀才、進士、明法] "
